        Specified by:
        updateItem in interface ModelEmployee
        Parameters:
        shopAddress - address of shop at which item is located
        previousDate - old expiration date of an item
        previousNumber - new number of a product of which type is item
        date - new expiration date of an item
        categories - new set of categories of an item
        newNumber - new number of a product of which type is item
        newName - new name of a product of which type is item
        newPrice - new price of an item (before discount)
        newQuantity - new quantity of an item
